channel.title: Repose
channel.description:
[center][IMG width=430 height=226]http://i62.tinypic.com/2h4lu82.jpg[/img][/center] [center] [b]What is Repose?[/b] [i]Repose started as a small little project I was working on after I quit development with another server. I have been working on this PI server for about three weeks now, and in that time most of it was spent removing content instead of adding it. After removing most of the content and such of the base server, it suddenly sparked inside of me that I should start making this server better. There isn't much to show as of now, most of the content I've added has been randomly chosen by my mind. And after only a few days of work, there hasn't been a lot of progress in the broad skills, but more in smaller areas. And to add to that, most of the work done has been collecting data and IDs so I can make everything in the server the way I want it to be, instead of someone else's design. More will be added to these lists later once I think of something to add, or happen to add it to the server.[/i] [/center] [center][b]Content[/b] [spoiler] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/6oifsy.jpg[/img] [b]Combat[/b] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/6oifsy.jpg[/img] Player vs Player Player vs NPC Correct equipping slots Correct item requirements Melee max hit formula Magic max hit formula Ranged max hit formula [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/29givt2.jpg[/img] [b]Magic[/b] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/29givt2.jpg[/img] Staves Combat spells Curse spells God spells & Charge Bones to spells Alchemy & Superheat Enchanting Telegrab Teleports Teleother Charge orbs [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2vuk5kj.jpg[/img] [b]Prayer[/b] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2vuk5kj.jpg[/img] Combat prayers Protect item Protect from prayers Retribution Redemption Smite Burying bones [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/9u13f9.jpg[/img] [b]Thieving[/b] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/9u13f9.jpg[/img] Pickpocketing Ardougne stalls [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/5mh95j.jpg[/img] [b]Mining[/b] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/5mh95j.jpg[/img] All pickaxes Level differences Random gems while mining [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/64nzlw.jpg[/img] [b]Smithing[/b] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/64nzlw.jpg[/img] Smelting Smithing [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/i6dyz4.jpg[/img] [b]Consumables[/b] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/i6dyz4.jpg[/img] Potion effects Eating Food [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/35n4rye.jpg[/img] [b]Misc[/b] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/35n4rye.jpg[/img] Emotes (missing skillcape emotes) Potion mixing Opening and closing doors [/spoiler] [/center] [center][b]Media[/b] [spoiler] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2ngve6e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ip4bd2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/v2xy7o.jpg[/img] [/spoiler] [i]Again, I do plan to add more to these two. It is pretty late right now, so I plan on continuing this tommorow, as well as posting updates as to what I have done.[/i]
Here is a list of updates. The reason I put this is here is so that I am almost forced to put whatever I program in here. Also I havent done anythin in the past few days. [7:55 PM 11/22/2014] - Started smelting [11:05 PM 11/22/2014] - Stopped smelting | Started magic PvP [3:39 AM 11/23/2014] - Finished magic teleports, teleblock, and teleother (Done for today) [6:06 PM 11/23/2014] - Not much done today to show, mostly bug fixing for magic. (Done for today)
[/center]

item.title: Repose
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Your videos aren't showing off anything.. different...
I agree, to an extent. I know they're not anything unique or over the top, but it's nice to post something rather than nothing.
If one person gets the logs from the tree, does it stop everyone? Or does it act like runescape and wait a cycle, and then stop everyone? Or does it even stop them?
If two people are cutting the same tree, it will stop both of them once the tree is finished. It doesn't wait an extra cycle for the person that didn't get the final logs, but I suppose it could.
Also, you shouldn't have had to "rewrite how objects are handled" for woodcutting... You should be able to use the same system for all skills that use objects.
The way it works now is a bit different. There is now a general class for objects that need to respawn, rather than it handling that within the woodcutting class or any other that requires an object to change without interaction.
Woodcutting and mining are nearly identical, except the animations are a bit different, and there's only 2 ores that have a limitless supply.
Indeed. I suppose mining wouldn't really need to be shown off. I just get off on showing off things I've accomplished.
I also couldn't tell in the video, (Mostly because someone had the playback set to like 5x the regular speed) are the stumps and rotations correct? Like does the tree spawn facing the same way it was before, or does it spawn to a default face (like 0)?
As far as I can tell, yes. Some of the stump IDs are incorrect, though, such as the maple stump and some of the different sized dead trees.

Read full topic

item.title: Repose
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your videos aren’t showing off anything… different…

If one person gets the logs from the tree, does it stop everyone? Or does it act like runescape and wait a cycle, and then stop everyone? Or does it even stop them?

Also, you shouldn’t have had to “rewrite how objects are handled” for woodcutting… You should be able to use the same system for all skills that use objects.
Woodcutting and mining are nearly identical, except the animations are a bit different, and there’s only 2 ores that have a limitless supply.
I also couldn’t tell in the video, (Mostly because someone had the playback set to like 5x the regular speed) are the stumps and rotations correct? Like does the tree spawn facing the same way it was before, or does it spawn to a default face (like 0)?

item.title: Repose
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Elrick:

Rep++ for using Ardougne as a thieving zone. I will forever remember the moment I first walked into Ardy and learned I could thieve from stalls, it’s probably one of the most nostalgic areas on the map for me aside from Shilo.

Well thanks! I only picked Ardougne as the first area because when I think about thieving I think about the countless of hours of grinding there. And also, the same as you, it’s nostalgiac because I remember paying people to thieve the silk stalls for me so I could sell the silk to the silk merchant.

As of now, I will be working on mining. So updates on that soon!

Read full topic

item.title: Repose
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]
What is Repose?
[i]Repose started as a small little project I was working on after I quit development with another server. I have been working on this PI server for about three weeks now, and in that time most of it was spent removing content instead of adding it. After removing most of the content and such of the base server, it suddenly sparked inside of me that I should start making this server better.

There isn’t much to show as of now, most of the content I’ve added has been randomly chosen by my mind. And after only a few days of work, there hasn’t been a lot of progress in the broad skills, but more in smaller areas. And to add to that, most of the work done has been collecting data and IDs so I can make everything in the server the way I want it to be, instead of someone else’s design.

More will be added to these lists later once I think of something to add, or happen to add it to the server.[/i]
[/center]
[center]Content
[spoiler]
Combat
Player vs Player
Player vs NPC
Correct equipping slots
Correct item requirements
Melee max hit formula
Magic max hit formula
Ranged max hit formula

Magic
Staves

God spells & Charge

Teleother
Charge orbs

Prayer

Protect item
Protect from prayers
Retribution
Redemption

Thieving

Mining
All pickaxes
Level differences
Random gems while mining

Smithing
Smelting
Smithing

Consumables
Potion effects
Eating Food

Misc
Emotes (missing skillcape emotes)
Potion mixing
Opening and closing doors
[/spoiler]
[/center]

[center]Media
[spoiler]



[/spoiler]

Again, I do plan to add more to these two. It is pretty late right now, so I plan on continuing this tommorow, as well as posting updates as to what I have done.

Here is a list of updates. The reason I put this is here is so that I am almost forced to put whatever I program in here. Also I havent done anythin in the past few days. [7:55 PM 11/22/2014] - Started smelting [11:05 PM 11/22/2014] - Stopped smelting | Started magic PvP [3:39 AM 11/23/2014] - Finished magic teleports, teleblock, and teleother (Done for today) [6:06 PM 11/23/2014] - Not much done today to show, mostly bug fixing for magic. (Done for today)
[/center]
